summary: Maggie, 19, works at a lesbian/LGBT bookstore. Her mom's getting divorced and has invited herself to stay with Maggie. Maggie hasn't told her, she's lesbian. Her new girlfriend moves in as well.
cast: Wendy Crewson|Karyn Dwyer|Christina Cox|Ann-Marie MacDonald|Marya Delver|Kevin Mundy|Tony Nappo|Jay Brazeau|Beatrice Zeilinger|Peter Outerbridge|Gerald Varga|Robert Parent|Corrine Koslo|Veena Sood|Tony Marr|Colleen Wheeler|Jenn Griffin|A.J. Bond
title: Mejor que el chocolate
